aboutBlock.title: The Future is Yours to Create

featuredSessions.title: About
featuredSessions.description: ideaHacks brings togather the very best mentors, investors, students and cofounders from across south east asia. Don't worry even if you're a beginenr, we offer extensive sessions for beginners to get you started quickly!
featuredSessions.label: Explore featured session

howItWas.description: Our 2017 event was a huge success with many projects continuing afterwards with support from the wide Singaporean network of startup founders.
howItWas.label: See how it was in 2017

education.title: Future of Education
education.description: Technology is sweeping through classrooms and educators. With the introduction of the new learning technology that will be available, the traditional methods of education will become obsolete.

nature.title: Future of Sustainability
nature.description: The need for sustainability and protecting the environment is a topic that very regularly debated and discussed.

transport.title: Future of Transport
transport.description: When we think of the future of transport we often think of flying cars or jetpacks. However Singapore is already advanced because of its intricate network of MRT lines and bus networks.

health.title: Future of Health
health.description: One of the UNâ€™s sustainable development goals is zero hunger. The aim is to achieve this goal by by 2030 and technology may be a huge part of that.

attendees.label: Worth of prizes to be given away

ticketsBlock.title: Tickets
ticketsBlock.ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks, lunch and party. Accommodation is NOT included in the ticket price.

galleryBlock.title: #dfua16 highlights
galleryBlock.description: This year's festival built lots of excitement. Check out photos from featured talks, hands-on learning sessions, and after-hours fun.
